Section Inherit

    + parent_g_group:Expanded G_GROUP;

Section Public

Size.


    - width_min:INTEGER <-

    - height_min:INTEGER <-

Update position.


    - set_position rac:AREA at (x,y:INTEGER) size (w,h:INTEGER) <-

Display.


    - draw_slave bmp:ABSTRACT_BITMAP from (x0,y0:INTEGER) to (x1,y1:INTEGER) <-

    - draw (x0,y0:INTEGER) to (x1,y1:INTEGER) <-

Event manager.


    - receive msg:EVENT <-
